description: Information about the medical history of a donor.
title: Medical history
name: medical_history

describedBy.description: The URL reference to the schema.

schema_version.description: The version number of the schema in major.minor.patch format.

alcohol_history.description: Estimated amount of alcohol consumed per day.
alcohol_history.guidelines: Indicate the amount consumed per day with units such as alcohol units (10mL or 8g of alcohol) or drinks (14g of alcohol).

medication.description: Medications the individual was taking at time of biomaterial collection.
medication.guidelines: Enter the medication and approximate dosage.

smoking_history.description: Estimated number of cigarettes smoked per day and for how many years.
smoking_history.guidelines: Enter an estimated number of cigarettes smoked per day and for how many years.

nutritional_state.description: Nutritional state of individual at time of biomaterial collection.
nutritional_state.example: Should be one of: normal, fasting, or feeding tube removed.

test_results.description: Results from any medical tests performed on the individual.

treatment.description: Description of treatments the individual has undergone prior to biomaterial collection.
